description.en: You were the greatest adventurer in the universe during a season of Mush.

description.en:
Number of trips you have completed without sleep.
			This trophy is only awarded if you survive beyond day 6.

Nombre de voyages que vous avez effectués sans jamais vous endormir.

description.de:
Number of trips you have completed without sleep.
			This trophy is only awarded if you survive beyond day 6.
description.es:
Cantidad de viajes que has realizado sin dormir.

description.en: Number of times you have explored a planet and come back alive.

description.es: Cantidad de veces que has explorado un planeta y has vuelto vivo(a).

description.de: Represents ofstroyed with the Natamy Rifle

description.en: You have wasted Mush with your own two hands!
description.fr: Mush que vous avez tués de vos propres mains !

description.es: ¡Mush que has matado con tus propias manos!

title.en: Great Tribal Leader of the Devourers of Phallic Amanite
title.fr: Chef De Caste Des Dévoreurs D'Amanite Phalloïde
title.de: Great Tribal Leader of the Devourers of Phallic Amanite

description.en: Mush invaders decimated by the crews with which you have travelled

description.en: Cameras Installed

description.en: Number of times you have caught Schrödinger
description.fr: Nombre de fois où vous avez attrapé Schrödinger.
description.de: Number of times you have caught Schrödinger
description.es: Cantidad de veces en las que has atrapado a Schrödinger.

description.en: Vomiting, coughs, colds and other complaints...
description.fr: Vomissement, Toux, Grippe, et autres désagréments...
description.de: Vomiting, coughs, colds and other complaints...
description.es: Vómitos, Tos, Gripe, y demás...

description.en: Mankarogs killed by your team during expeditions
description.fr: Mankarogs tués par votre équipe en expédition
description.de: Mankarogs killed by your team during expeditions
description.es: Mankarogs abatidos por tu equipo en expedición

description.en: He who searches, finds!
description.fr: Qui cherche trouve !
description.de: He who searches, finds!
description.es: ¡El que busca, encuentra!

description.en: On this occasion, you managed to find the perfect words...
description.fr: A ce moment là, vous avez su trouvez les mots justes...
description.de: On this occasion, you managed to find the perfect words...
description.es: Todo comenzó una vez, cuando ...

description.en: Number of coffees taken from the machine.
description.fr: Nombre de cafés retirés en machine.
description.de: Number of coffees taken from the machine.
description.es: Cantidad de cafés retirados de la máquina.

description.en: The Commandant must always be the last to leave the ship.
description.fr: Le Commandant doit être le dernier à quitter le vaisseau.
description.de: The Commandant must always be the last to leave the ship.
description.es: El comandante siempre es el último en abandonar la nave.

description.en: You held out until the end. You have become part of History!
description.fr: Vous avez tenu bon jusqu'à la fin. Vous faites partie de l'Histoire !
description.de: You held out until the end. You have become part of History!
description.es: ¡Has sobrevivido hasta el final, eres parte de la historia!

description.en: During one of your voyages, your crew successfully completed a series of legendary tasks using the communications module.
description.fr: Durant un de vos voyages, votre équipage a réussi à effectuer une quantité de tâches légendaire dans le module de Communication
description.de: During one of your voyages, your crew successfully completed a series of legendary tasks using the communications module.
description.es: Durante uno de tus viajes, tu equipo ha logrado realizar una gran cantidad de tareas en el módulo de comunicación

description.en: During one of your voyages, your team solved the Mush enigma.
description.fr: Durant un de vos voyages, votre équipage a résolu l'énigme du Gênome Mush.
description.de: During one of your voyages, your team solved the Mush enigma.
description.es: Durante uno de tus viajes, tu equipo ha resuelto el enigma del genoma Mush.

title.de: If Today Was Your Last Day

description.en: Number of days of your longest voyage aboard the Daedalus
description.fr: Durée en jours de votre plus long voyage à bord du Daedalus.
description.de: Number of days of your longest voyage aboard the Daedalus
description.es: El viaje más largo en tiempo que has realizado a bordo del Daedalus.

description.en: You placed first in the Triumph rankings
description.fr: Vous avez été premier au classement de Triomphe
description.de: You placed first in the Triumph rankings
description.es: Has sido el primero en la Clasificación de Gloria

description.en: You placed second in the Triumph rankings
description.fr: Vous avez été second au classement de Triomphe
description.de: You placed second in the Triumph rankings

description.en: You placed third in the Triumph rankings
description.fr: Vous avez été troisième au classement de Triomphe
description.de: You placed third in the Triumph rankings
description.es: Has sido el tercero en la Clasificación de Gloria

description.en: You placed fourth in the Triumph rankings
description.fr: Vous avez été quatrième au classement de Triomphe
description.de: You placed fourth in the Triumph rankings
description.es: Has sido cuarto en la Clasificación de Gloria

description.en: You made it into the top 7 of the Triumph rankings
description.fr: Vous avez fait partie des 7 premiers au classement de Triomphe
description.de: You made it into the top 7 of the Triumph rankings
description.es: Has sido uno de los 7 primeros en la Clasificación de Gloria

description.en: Number of times you've made it into the last 9
description.fr: Nombre de fois où vous avez fait partie des 9 derniers
description.de: Number of times you've made it into the last 9
description.es: Cantidad de veces en que has sido uno de los 9 últimos

name.en: Mini Mush Portrait of Jin Su
name.fr: Mini Portrait Mush de Jin Su
name.de: Mini Mush Portrait of Jin Su

name.en: Mini Mush Portrait of Kuan Ti
name.fr: Mini Portrait Mush de Kuan Ti
name.de: Mini Mush Portrait of Kuan Ti

name.en: Number of cycles won playing as the chief
name.fr: Nombre de cycles passés à jouer au chef
name.de: Number of cycles won playing as the chief

description.en: You were the captain of the Daedalus, so... how did it feel? All-powerful?
description.fr: Vous avez été dans la peau du commandant du Daedalus, alors... comment on se sent, tout puissant ?
description.de: You were the captain of the Daedalus, so... how did it feel? All-powerful?
description.es: Has estado en los zapatos del comandante del Daedalus. ¿Qué se siente tener el poder?

name.en: Number of cycles won reading the cards
name.fr: Nombre de cycles passés à lire des cartes
name.de: Number of cycles won reading the cards

description.en: You were the navigator of the Daedalus, so... how did it feel? Dizzying?
description.fr: Vous avez été dans la peau de la navigatrice du Daedalus, alors... comment on se sent, désorienté ?
description.de: You were the navigator of the Daedalus, so... how did it feel? Dizzying?
description.es: Has estado en el puesto de la experta en navegación del Daedalus, ¿qué se siente perderse?

title.en: After the nebula, take a right
title.fr: Après la nebuleuse, tournez à droite
title.de: After the nebula, take a right

name.en: Number of cycles won contemplating your work
name.fr: Nombre de cycles à contempler son oeuvre
name.de: Number of cycles won contemplating your work

description.en: You were the designer of the Daedalus, so... how did you feel? Proud?
description.fr: Vous avez été dans la peau du concepteur du Daedalus, alors... comment on se sent, fier ?
description.de: You were the designer of the Daedalus, so... how did you feel? Proud?
description.es: Has estado en el lugar de un creador Daedalus. ¿Orgulloso?

name.en: Number of cycles won... listening to others
name.fr: Nombre de cycles passés à allu...écouter les autres
name.de: Number of cycles won... listening to others
name.es: Ciclos pasados escuchando a los demás

description.en: You were the psychologist of the Daedalus, so... how did you feel? Mad?
description.fr: Vous avez été dans la peau de la psychologue du Daedalus, alors... comment on se sent, folle ?
description.de: You were the psychologist of the Daedalus, so... how did you feel? Mad?
description.es: Has sido psicólogo(a) en el Daedalus. ¿De verdad están todos locos?

title.en: In the eyes, I read it in your eyes!
title.fr: Dans les yeux, j'ai dit dans les yeux !
title.de: In the eyes, I read it in your eyes!

name.en: Number of cycles won running round in circles
name.fr: Nombre de cycles à tourner en rond
name.de: Number of cycles won running round in circles
name.es: Ciclos en una nave de caza

description.en: You were the most feared hunter aboard the Daedalus... In saying that, there weren't that many hunters...
description.fr: Vous avez été dans la peau d'un des plus redoutable chasseur du Daedalus... Bon, vous n'êtes pas très nombreux non plus...
description.de: You were the most feared hunter aboard the Daedalus... In saying that, there weren't that many hunters...
description.es: Has sido un piloto de caza en el Daedalus... ¡Bam, bam, BUUUUM!

title.fr: Toujours plus vite, toujours plus loin !

name.en: Number of cycles won, spent with the others
name.fr: Nombre de cycles passés à fréquenter des 3èmes types
name.de: Number of cycles won, spent with the others
name.es: Ciclos pasados con contactos del tercer tipo

description.en: You were a legendary explorer, how did it go... were you disappointed not to have 3 eyes?
description.fr: Vous avez été dans la peau d'une exploratrice légendaire, alors... déçu de ne pas avoir 3 yeux ?
description.de: You were a legendary explorer, how did it go... were you disappointed not to have 3 eyes?
description.es: Has sido una exploradora legendaria. Te hubiese gustado tener 3 ojos, ¿verdad?

title.fr: Hé mec, Il est où mon vaisseau ?
title.es: Cuando tu vas, yo ya volví

title.en: You don't exactly look like a lucky charm!
title.fr: Toi, t'as pas une gueule de porte-bonheur !
title.de: You don't exactly look like a lucky charm!

title.fr: Tout le monde est perdu sauf moi ?!

title.en: The Epic voyages of Jiang Hua
title.de: The Epic voyages of Jiang Hua

name.en: Number of cycles spent surfing the lowest frequencies
name.fr: Nombre de cycles passés à surfer sur les basses fréquences
name.de: Number of cycles spent surfing the lowest frequencies
name.es: Ciclos pasados buscando en las bajas frecuencias

description.en: You have been an intrepid system rebel, nothing and nobody can distract you from the truth!
description.fr: Vous avez été dans la peau d'une intrépide rebelle au système, rien ni personne ne peut vous détourner de la vérité !
description.de: You have been an intrepid system rebel, nothing and nobody can distract you from the truth!
description.es: Has sido una rebelde intrépida. Un modelo a seguir en las próximas misiones.

name.en: Number of cycles spent taking stuff out
name.fr: Nombre de cycles passés à dégommer des trucs
name.de: Number of cycles spent taking stuff out

description.en: You have been a galactic sharp-shooter, are you still as trigger-happy?
description.fr: Vous avez été dans la peau d'un franc-tireur de l'espace, vous avez encore la gachette facile ?
description.de: You have been a galactic sharp-shooter, are you still as trigger-happy?
description.es: Has sido un francotirador del espacio. ¡Ya deja de apuntarme!

title.en: Keep your griends close, and your enemies closer.
title.fr: Garde tes amis près de toi, et tes ennemis encore plus près.
title.de: Keep your griends close, and your enemies closer.

title.en: If you're asking the question, Doctor Caliber has the answer.
title.fr: Si vous posez une question, monsieur calibre donne la réponse.
title.de: If you're asking the question, Doctor Caliber has the answer.

title.en: If any of you move, I will execute every last one of you!
title.fr: Le premier qui bouge, je lui fais frire la cervelle !
title.de: If any of you move, I will execute every last one of you!

name.en: Number of cycles examining the infinitely small
name.fr: Nombre de cycles passés à scruter l'infiniment petit
name.de: Number of cycles examining the infinitely small
name.es: Ciclos viendo la vida a través de un microscopio

title.en: What on earth am I doing?
title.fr: Mais qu'est ce que je fais là ?
title.de: What on earth am I doing?

description.en: You were a renowned scientist, could you be persuaded to refute that for a tasty bonus?
description.fr: Vous avez été dans la peau d'une scientifique de renom, vous ne diriez pas non pour un petit prélévement de plus ?
description.de: You were a renowned scientist, could you be persuaded to refute that for a tasty bonus?
description.es: Has sido un científico de renombre intergaláctico. Nunca pensaste ser tan inteligente, ¿verdad?

name.en: Number of cycles spent cooking up suspect dishes
name.fr: Nombre de cycles passés à cuisiner des plats suspects
name.de: Number of cycles spent cooking up suspect dishes

description.en: Lesson 1, Act 1 : Where is Stephen ? Stephen is ... in the kitchen !
description.fr: Leçon 1, Acte 1 : Where is Stephen ? Stephen is ... in the kitchen !
description.de: Lesson 1, Act 1 : Where is Stephen ? Stephen is ... in the kitchen !
description.es: Has sido el mejor cocinero del espacio, pero... ¿por qué nunca comes lo que cocinas?

title.fr: Non, je fais aussi la cuisine.

name.en: Number of cycles spent cultivating psychotropic plants
name.fr: Nombre de cycles passés à cultiver des plantes hallucinogènes
name.de: Number of cycles spent cultivating psychotropic plants

title.en: She likes a little, a lot...
title.de: She likes a little, a lot...

description.en: You were once a nature lover, at the end of your days you'll surely make good fertilizer.
description.fr: Vous avez été dans la peau d'un amoureux de la nature, à la fin de votre existence vous ferez sûrement du bon engrais.
description.de: You were once a nature lover, at the end of your days you'll surely make good fertilizer.
description.es: Has sido un amante de la naturaleza, cuando mueras serás un buen abono.

title.en: Is that a banana in your pocket!
title.de: Is that a banana in your pocket!

name.en: Number of cycles you've spent providing blood samples
name.fr: Nombre de cycles passés à se faire préléver des échantillons sanguins
name.de: Number of cycles you've spent providing blood samples
name.es: Ciclos pasados haciéndose sacar muestras de sangre

description.en: You lived in the body of the most popular of human guinea pigs, although this wasn't exactly the type of celebrity you dreamed of becoming!
description.fr: Vous avez vécu dans la peau du cobaye humain le plus prisé ces derniers temps, pas le genre de célébrité dont vous réviez !
description.de: You lived in the body of the most popular of human guinea pigs, although this wasn't exactly the type of celebrity you dreamed of becoming!
description.es: Siempre quisiste aportar a la ciencia, ¡pero no de esa manera!

name.en: Number of cycles spent stroking your cat
name.fr: Nombre de cycles passés à passer son temps à caresser son chat
name.de: Number of cycles spent stroking your cat

description.en: Yeah, nobody pretends to understand a single word you say, maybe now would be a good time to come back to the land of the mortals.
description.fr: Oui, personne ne comprend un traître mot de ce que vous dîtes, peut-être serait'il bon de revenir parmi le commun des mortels.
description.de: Yeah, nobody pretends to understand a single word you say, maybe now would be a good time to come back to the land of the mortals.
description.es: Eres un personaje tan inteligente pero tan misterioso...

name.en: Number of turns spent counting your cash
name.fr: Nombre de cycles passés à compter ses billets
name.de: Number of turns spent counting your cash

description.en: Being a billionaire is a dream on Earth... But in space, with a Mush on board...
description.fr: Etre milliardaire, c'est le rêve de tout homme sur terre... Mais dans l'espace, et avec un Mush à bord...
description.de: Being a billionaire is a dream on Earth... But in space, with a Mush on board...
description.es: En la tierra tus billetes valen mucho... pero en el espacio, y con un Mush a bordo...

title.en: There's nothing for people like you round here!
title.de: There's nothing for people like you round here!

title.fr: C'est à moi que tu parles ?

title.en: There's cash to be made here, I can smell it!
title.fr: Y'a du fric à se faire, je le sens !
title.de: There's cash to be made here, I can smell it!

title.en: The guy's worth 3 billion and change!
title.fr: L'homme qui valait 3 milliards et des brouettes
title.de: The guy's worth 3 billion and change!

name.en: Number of cycles spent fixing your barnet fair.
name.fr: Nombre de cycles passés à coiffer sa touffe.
name.de: Number of cycles spent fixing your barnet fair.

description.en: You've been bopping round the corridors to the rhythm of disco-pop, it's a shame this costume doesn't have sequins...
description.fr: Vous avez arpenté les couloirs du Daedalus sur le rythme du disco-pop, dommage que ce costume manque de paillette...
description.de: You've been bopping round the corridors to the rhythm of disco-pop, it's a shame this costume doesn't have sequins...
description.es: Fuiste quien le puso ritmo a la travesía espacial.

name.en: Number of cycles spent sulking in a corner.
name.fr: Nombre de cycles passés à bouder dans son coin.
name.de: Number of cycles spent sulking in a corner.

title.fr: Attendez que je passe la seconde !

description.en: You lived as a brilliant engineer, and those who underestimated you regret it bitterly!
description.fr: Vous avez vécu dans la peau d'un brillant ingénieur, ceux qui vous ont sous-estimé le regrette encore amèrement !
description.de: You lived as a brilliant engineer, and those who underestimated you regret it bitterly!
description.es: Felizmente fuiste ingeniero y no un animador de fiestas infantiles.

name.en: Number of cycles spent as an intergalactic Don Juan.
name.fr: Nombre de cycles passés à draguer à tout va.
name.de: Number of cycles spent as an intergalactic Don Juan.

description.en: You lived as a self-proclaimed intergalactic super hero, and those who mocked you will be reminded of it one day!
description.fr: Vous avez vécu dans la peau d'un super héros intergalactique auto-proclamé, ceux qui se moque de vous s'en souviendront un jour !
description.de: You lived as a self-proclaimed intergalactic super hero, and those who mocked you will be reminded of it one day!
description.es: Fuiste un héroe intergaláctico, ¡con una reputación dudosa pero famoso al fin!

title.fr: Tire sur tout ce qui bouge !

name.en: Number of cycles spent honoring the SDF.
name.fr: Nombre de cycles passés à vénérer la fédération.
name.de: Number of cycles spent honoring the SDF.

description.en: You have lived as a pawn of the Federation. It's time to change teams!
description.fr: Vous avez vécu dans la peau d'un pion de la fédération, il serait temps de changer de bord !
description.de: You have lived as a pawn of the Federation. It's time to change teams!
description.es: Fuiste un peón de la FDS en el Daedalus, ¿de qué lado estás?

name.en: Number of cycles spent fungifying in a dark corner
name.fr: Nombre de cycles passés à phongiférer dans son coin
name.de: Number of cycles spent fungifying in a dark corner
name.es: Ciclos pasados como el malo de la película

description.en: Gnarf, shnarf... brarf... Reproduction... Mushhhh!
description.fr: Gnouarf, shnarf... beuarf... Reproduction... Mushhhh !
description.de: Gnarf, shnarf... brarf... Reproduction... Mushhhh!
description.es: Fuiste uno de los villanos más temidos del espacio. Es más, el juego lleva tu nombre.

title.en: Bright eyes and a bushy skin?!
title.de: Bright eyes and a bushy skin?!

description.en: Title uniquely awarded to Mush beta testers.
description.fr: Titre uniquement décerné aux beta-testeurs de Mush.
description.de: Title uniquely awarded to Mush beta testers.
description.es: Título exclusivo para los beta-testers de Mush.

description.en: Title uniquely awarded to players in the sneak preview of Mush.
description.fr: Titre uniquement décerné aux joueurs de l'avant-première de Mush.
description.de: Title uniquely awarded to players in the sneak preview of Mush.
description.es: Título exclusivo para los participantes en el Pre-Estreno de Mush.

description.en: Title uniquely awarded to survivers of the NERON Flu epidemic.
description.fr: Titre réservé aux survivants de l'épisode grippal de NERON.
description.de: Title uniquely awarded to survivers of the NERON Flu epidemic.
description.es: Título reservado a los supervivientes del ataque gripal de NERON.

description.en: Title uniquely awarded to survivors of the Daedalus who reached Eden, the promised land.
description.fr: Titre réservé aux survivants du Daedalus ayant atteint Eden, la terre promise.
description.de: Title uniquely awarded to survivors of the Daedalus who reached Eden, the promised land.
description.es: Título exclusivo para los supervivientes del Daedalus que llegaron a Edén, la tierra prometida.

title.en: Founder of the Order of Eden
title.de: Founder of the Order of Eden

description.en: Title uniquely awarded to Mush agents who infested Eden, the contaminated land.
description.fr: Titre réservé aux Mush ayant infesté Eden, la terre contaminée !
description.de: Title uniquely awarded to Mush agents who infested Eden, the contaminated land.
description.es: Título reservado a los Mush que contaminaron el Edén.

description.en: Title reserved for thosewho don't like to be disturbed while they're growing radishes or whatever it is they do.
description.fr: Titre réservé à ceux qui n'aime pas qu'on les embêtent pendant qu'ils cultivent leurs radis.
description.de: Title reserved for thosewho don't like to be disturbed while they're growing radishes or whatever it is they do.
description.es: Título reservado a quienes no les gusta ser molestados cuando juegan.

description.en: One more, one less, I take care of business!
description.fr: Un de plus, un de moins, j'en fais mon affaire !
description.de: One more, one less, I take care of business!
description.es: Uno más, uno menos, igual ya gané.

description.en: You have emerged victorious from a fungal battle.
description.fr: Vous avez triomphé lors d'une bataille fongique.
description.de: You have emerged victorious from a fungal battle.
description.es: Has vencido en una batalla mushiana.

description.en: Done and dusted. Job's a good one.
description.fr: Vite fait, bien fait, emballé c'est pesé.
description.de: Done and dusted. Job's a good one.
description.es: Fue rápido y sin dolor.

description.en: I'm quick as bro. 1 winner, 16 losers. Quick smart
description.fr: Je suis rapide. 1 gagnant, 16 perdants. Rapide
description.de: I'm quick as bro. 1 winner, 16 losers. Quick smart
description.es: Solo hubo un ganador y fuiste tú.

description.en: You're here for the long game. Good work!
description.fr: Vous les préférez bien longues vos parties. Super !
description.de: You're here for the long game. Good work!
description.es: Prefieres las partidas largas, como los grandes.

description.en: You never saw this one coming...
description.fr: Vous l'avez pas vu venir celui là...
description.de: You never saw this one coming...
description.es: Ese que no se deja ver...

description.en: Little by little!
description.fr: Tu quoque mi fungi !
description.de: Little by little!
description.es: ¿Qué quieres ser cuando seas grande?

name.en: You have survived a fungal battle as Chun!
name.de: You have survived a fungal battle as Chun!
name.es: Has sobrevivido a una batalla mushiana siendo Chun

description.en: You have survived a fungal battle as Chun!
description.fr: Vous avez survécu à une bataille fongique en étant Chun !
description.de: You have survived a fungal battle as Chun!
description.es: Has sobrevivido a una batalla mushiana siendo Chun.

description.en: You' were strolling around the Deadalus in Episode 1 of Mush
description.fr: Vous avez arpenté le Daedalus durant le premier épisode de Mush.
description.de: You' were strolling around the Deadalus in Episode 1 of Mush
description.es: Participaste en el primer episodio de Mush.

description.en: You' were strolling around the Deadalus during Episode 2 of Mush
description.fr: Vous avez arpenté le Daedalus durant le deuxième épisode de Mush.
description.de: You' were strolling around the Deadalus during Episode 2 of Mush
description.es: Participaste en el segundo episodio de Mush.

description.en: You' were strolling around the Deadalus during Episode 3 of Mush
description.fr: Vous avez arpenté le Daedalus durant le troisième épisode de Mush.
description.de: You' were strolling around the Deadalus during Episode 3 of Mush
description.es: Participaste en el tercer episodio de Mush.

description.en: You' were strolling around the Deadalus during Episode 4 of Mush.
description.fr: Vous avez arpenté le Daedalus durant le quatrième épisode de Mush.
description.de: You' were strolling around the Deadalus during Episode 4 of Mush.
description.es: Participaste en el cuarto episodio de Mush.

description.en: You were aboard the Daedalus during Episode 5 of Mush.
description.fr: Vous avez erré sur le Daedalus durant le cinquième épisode de Mush.
description.de: You were aboard the Daedalus during Episode 5 of Mush.
description.es: Participaste en el quinto episodio de Mush.

description.fr: Vous avez erré sur le Daedalus durant le sixième épisode de Mush.

description.en: You have supported Mush and with your help, it has evolved. Thank you!
description.fr: Vous avez soutenu Mush et grâce à vous on l'a fait avancer, merci !
description.de: You have supported Mush and with your help, it has evolved. Thank you!
description.es: Has apoyado al desarrollo del juego. ¡Gracias!

name.en: You have already supported your community by sending a gift to another player, bravo!
name.de: You have already supported your community by sending a gift to another player, bravo!
name.es: Has sido generoso enviando un regalo a un jugador. ¡Bravo!

description.en: You have already supported your community by sending a gift to another player, bravo!
description.fr: Vous avez déjà soutenu votre communauté en envoyant un cadeau à un joueur, bravo !
description.de: You have already supported your community by sending a gift to another player, bravo!
description.es: Has sido generoso enviando un regalo a un jugador. ¡Bravo!
